mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(t.stat_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS date, IFNULL(r.reservation_count, 0) AS reservationCount FROM ( -- 최근 7일 날짜 생성 SELECT CURDATE() - INTERVAL seq DAY AS stat_date FROM ( SELECT 0 AS seq UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 ) s ) t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT reservation_date AS stat_date, COUNT(*) AS reservation_count FROM reservation WHERE popup_no = #{popupNo} AND reservation_date BETWEEN CURDATE() - INTERVAL 6 DAY AND CURDATE() GROUP BY reservation_date ) r ON t.stat_date = r.stat_date ORDER BY t.stat_date ASC;
